channel.description: Recent content in NYS:SO on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Southern CEO Warns of Revolution If Power Bills Not Cheaper
item.description: The chief of utility giant Southern Co. warned that Americans will revolt if they end up on the hook for the soaring power costs associated with AI demand.
